lines.text: You talk as if astrology is something to be ashamed of, like witchcraft or being a Democrat.
Don't you ever look at stars, Ethel?
I did once, but I'm married now!
How did you live? How did you eat?
[Sound of tally-ho bugle is heard on the soundtrack]
[He indicates a pile of tin cans]
15. Her husband? Well, there's a gentleman down here who won't wake up. If he's what you want, you better come and wake him yourself!
Good, ahead, shoot me. I wouldn't blame you.
Well... I'm sorry, but I'm not shooting anybody except by appointment.
